doc.after: In 1921 the French Academy of Sciences recommended using Esperanto for international scientific communication 77 A few scientists and mathematicians such as Maurice Fr chet mathematics John C Wells linguistics Helmar Frank pedagogy and cybernetics and Nobel laureate Reinhard Selten economics have published part of their work in Esperanto Frank and Selten were among the founders of the International Academy of Sciences in San Marino sometimes called the Esperanto University where Esperanto is the primary language of teaching and administration 78 79
